text: The consent and approval of Congress set forth in § 9-1103.01 is given on the express condition that § 13(a) of Article XI and § 3(d) of Article XII of such Compact shall not be used to break a lawful strike by the employees of any carrier authorized to provide service pursuant to such Compact.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 1-2415.

1973 Ed., § 1-1413.

Editor's Notes

This section was enacted prior to revision of the Compact. References to specific sections of the Compact have been updated following revision of the Compact.

DC CODE § 9-1103.05

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Congressional consent conditioned on nonuse of Compact to break a lawful strike.
